@graph.name: OptizenAI
@graph.description: AI-powered e-commerce optimization platform with automated product updates, collection management, and intelligent content generation for online stores.
@graph.browserRequirements: Modern web browser with JavaScript enabled
featureList: Automated meta and body content parsing
Product detail AI logging with enhanced UI
Retry functionality for failed AI updates

audience.audienceType: E-commerce businesses, Online retailers, Digital marketers

@graph.name: OptizenAI Changelog - Latest Updates and Features
@graph.description: Track the latest updates, features, and improvements to OptizenAI platform including AI enhancements, UI improvements, and new functionality releases.

@graph.name: OptizenAI Release History
@graph.description: Chronological list of OptizenAI platform updates and feature releases

itemListElement.name: OptizenAI Release - August 18, 2024
itemListElement.description: Major AI feature additions for Collection and Tag pages, enhanced parsing capabilities, improved UI with Read More functionality, and retry mechanisms for failed updates.

itemListElement.name: OptizenAI Release - August 14, 2024
itemListElement.description: Enhanced product filtering functionality allowing users to distinguish between Active and Draft products for AI-powered updates.

mainEntity.name: What new AI features were added to OptizenAI?

acceptedAnswer.text: The latest updates include AI features for Collection pages, AI features for Tag pages, enhanced parsing of all page meta and body content for AI reference data, and improved retry functionality for failed AI updates.

mainEntity.name: How does the product filtering feature work?

acceptedAnswer.text: The new filtering functionality allows users to distinguish between Active and Draft products when applying AI updates, providing better control over which products receive automated optimizations.

mainEntity.name: What UI improvements were made in the latest release?

acceptedAnswer.text: The platform now includes a 'Read More' tab on AI Log pages for Product detail logs, providing an improved user interface for reviewing AI-generated content and updates.

hasDefinedTerm.name: AI Log Pages
hasDefinedTerm.description: Interface pages that display detailed logs of AI-powered updates and modifications made to products, collections, and tags.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Collection Pages
hasDefinedTerm.description: E-commerce category pages that group related products, now enhanced with AI optimization capabilities.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Tag Pages
hasDefinedTerm.description: Product classification pages using tags for organization, now featuring AI-powered content optimization.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Meta and Body Content Parsing
hasDefinedTerm.description: AI process that analyzes and extracts data from webpage metadata and body content for optimization reference.
